title: What was the initial invention of computers and the internet? - Quora

response.answer_text: Charles Babbage invented the concept of programmable computers in early 1800s . The Internet was conceived by U.S. military in late 1960s (ARPANET). The concept of digital circuits was conceived by George Boole in about 1854. Note that Boolean logic (zeros and ones) is the basis of all computers. The thinking of computer logic had already existed. The electronic conveyance of such thinking is recent.
